mapper.select: SELECT tr.* FROM t_role tr,t_user_role tur WHERE tur.role_id = tr.id AND tur.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT tm.path,tm.name title,tm.`icon`,tm.`linkUrl`,tm.`parentMenuId` FROM t_role tr,t_role_menu trm,t_menu tm WHERE tr.`id`=trm.`role_id` AND trm.`menu_id`=tm.`id` AND tr.`id`=#{roleId};
